FTP Access for Administrator

Why Enabling FTP Access to Admin Account is not a good idea?

Arozos uses the same username and password in all its main account and FTP accounts. In simple words, you can login to your FTP account using the same username and password you used in logging in to the web desktop interface.

FTP protocol send your username and password in plain text to server side for validation. This process is unsafe and easily hackable by hackers.

To ensure the safety of your account, only enable administrator FTP access within a trusted network environment (e.g. in offline LAN or at home).
